title: Coach of the Year Odds, Bortles Nightmare Continues (Football 08/18)
description:
Will Brinson and John Breech take a look at all the NFL news happening around the league, including the triumphant return of Jay Cutler to the NFL field (3:30), the danger of starting Ryan Mallett for the Ravens (7:00), the Jaguars continuing issues with Blake Bortles (10:00) . Chris Long's strong social decision (13:05), the Eagles potentially dangerous defense, the Bills chance to crater for the top pick (21:50), Tampa Bay's continued kicking issues(25:00), Brinson's "Madden" simulation (30:00) and then they take a look at some good bets for Coach of the Year odds.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
